explains: n. 长期缺乏，严重短缺；<古>口渴；干旱，旱灾
wordGroup: drought resistance 耐旱性，抗旱性

sentences.en: Week after week the drought continued.
sentences.cn: 干旱持续了好多个星期。

sentences.en: During the drought the river dried up.
sentences.cn: 旱灾期间，河流都干涸了。

sentences.en: The drought there is stretching resources.
sentences.cn: 那里的干旱正在耗尽财力物力。
